website_summaries.verdict: Value-priced rear view backup camera that's easy to install. Useful features in a simple-to-operate camera.
pros: Small camera that won't affect your car's style
cons: Some reports that customer support is lacking

customer_reviews.title: Installs in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I own a few cameras from this same company, and every one of them works perfect. I put this on my wife’s Honda Oddyssey. Installation is a snap, simply mount the monitor to iether the windshield or the dash, plug into your power port/cigarette lighter and you’re done up front. Open up your tail light (iether side-doesn’t matter) and connect to your power wire going to you’re reverse bulb (you can also use full-time-power) and connect the ground. Done. Close up you’re tail light, mount you’re camera to you’re license plate, connect the wire and you now have clear vision of everything behind you. Simple...and very effective!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for hooking up trailers
customer_reviews.text: I put this camera on my Jeep so I can see the hitch when I’m backing up to a trailer. It works great. No more having to get out to check where I’m at 3 or 4 times before I get it right, just watch the camera and back the ball right under the hitch the first time. It had good directions that were easy to follow and easy to install, it only took me about an hour and I’m no mechanic by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Stuff neck? This will help
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for seniors without backup cameras. Get nothing less than 5" monitor. You may save some money with smaller screens but you'll regret the results. easy installation. You may have to uncover some parts of the car to hide the wiring, but you'll be glad you did. Remember, the black/red wires are going to the rear backup light. Car backup light has the same color. Plug in and enjoy. Mike K
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Best back up cam ever
customer_reviews.text: This backup camera is amazing the install was a breeze and the quality is better then the stock dashcam on my friends 2016 taho. Wiring it to the reverse lights makes it so the camera only turns on when the car is in reverse so it’s not always on whitch is a plus for me and the screen is Thebes perfect size not to big not to small. All around great camera and definitely a great option
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use when I take the tailgate off my truck because the camera is located in the tailgate and I am without a backup camera. This was super easy to hook up. One wire to my backup lights and the other to a ground. I used the supplied cigarette lighter adapter for the monitor and it took less than 15 minutes to install it. Works well and the video quality is good enough to see what is behind you when backing up to a trailer I plan on adding a switch to the camera so I can turn it off and on without having the truck in reverse. It really is a good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alley Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great value product and a terrific company to buy from
customer_reviews.text: For an aftermarket back up camera this works terrific! easy out of the box for install with great connectivity. Screen clarity was very good and the backup track lines really help to get you in the right spot! I've posted some photos showing how well the packing was and what the install looks like, and lastly hooking up the trailer!
customer_reviews.author: Ed wright

customer_reviews.title: A real neck saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product! I have installed it on my Kubota RTV 900 that is used daily on my farm. Provides a clear picture of what's behind without the need for vibration plagued rear view mirrors. Hitching trailers, backing up for loading the bed or just seeing what's behind me in general is wonderful. I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Deans

customer_reviews.title: Surprises found on BMW... Not easy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: The instruction manual is very poor. Although it may look like it has no science to install it, after the basic installation I found out that my type of car (BMW) needs extra work and a few extra $$ to make it work. Since I was experiencing electrical interference I had to buy a relay, a set of wires and fuses. The final price wasn’t expected at all. I ended up spending around $130 and killing my back working on it for a few hours. At least the product company answered my e-mails in the next day.
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO CASSELLA

customer_reviews.title: Wireless signal has no problems for a mid size SUV
customer_reviews.text: Installed this Item in a mid sized SUV, Left the transmitter in a pocket between the interior and exterior body of the hatch! connected in to the reverse light wire, turns on exactly as it should, the signal is strong and has never failed. I am very pleased with the screen graphics for the price. Good bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Computerdork

customer_reviews.title: Simple install, great product
customer_reviews.text: “Verified purchased” Bought for my work truck , works great and easy to install , love the wi if hook up , great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fragurazzusmc

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: The camera did not work after initial installation. After contacting seller, they informed that German cars need additional 12V hardware for this camera to work. Ordered the 12V hardware and attached it - the camera worked for less than 2 weeks then completely stopped.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This setup is a fantastic all around value. Good camera quality with a sufficient viewing angle. Placement of the camera at installation is critical to get the optimum view. Installation is straightforward and unlike most kits available on Amazon this kit does come with EVERYTHING you need for the install. Truly a fantastic value and I will absolutely be buying two more for my sister's cars. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: Clear Image - Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The screen blacked out a couple times but would work after turning on/off. Customer service sent another one out right away and were easy to work with. Using on a single cab long bed truck and signal is plenty strong. Makes hooking up a trailer very easy. Would happily buy again.

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased for my car to help me out. It's relatively easy to install. It took him about 10 minutes and a lot of swear words. I love that it only shows when you put the car in reverse so no distractions while driving.
customer_reviews.author: CarolAnn

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: The price is reasonable for an aftermarket backup camera. It was an easy installation on my Tahoe especially since I already have a back up sensor and I was able to splice into it. The wireless transmission works fine even though it is an SUV. The extra cable provided for the monitor was very useful since I was able to mount the monitor in the top left side of the window and the cable could be spliced into the fuse box on the same side. No dangling wires. I have been using it for several days and have had no problems, even with heavy rains.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I can't turn my head so well any more, so this helps a lot. Without this backup camera, I might have had to trade my car. I'm not much of a mechanic, so it says a lot if I could install it. It looks well made, and it arrived well packaged. I'm optimistic that it will hold up as long as my car does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
